item.description:
Yes, it's true. I am in Tampa and earlier when I was riding my bike and getting in shape for the next Tour-De-France, a reminder flashes in my head, "Schedule a Meetup!"

So just like that - Voila!

The next meeting is the THIRD Tuesday of March. We will be attending a new restaurant once again.

New restaurant....new excitement.....new atmosphere. Won't you join us?

Dale

group.name: The Hartford Russian Language Meetup Group

item.name: Casual Meetup - Hartford Russian Language Group
